thread.title: Taraji P. Henson Fronts "Essence's" November Issue
thread.title_full: Taraji P. Henson Fronts "Essence's" November Issue

title: Taraji P. Henson Fronts "Essence's" November Issue
text:
Taraji P. Henson Fronts "Essence's" November Issue Posted just a moment ago 
Essence (NEW YORK) -- Taraji P. Henson graces the cover of Essence magazine 's #LifeGoals Guide issue, in which she discusses the perfect timing of her role as Cookie Lyon on Empire . 
"I'm just gonna keep amassing an audience," says the Oscar- and Emmy-nominated actress. "Everything was strategically planned. This is what all my efforts are for." 
She's also grateful for a legion of new fans. "Even though people are just now finding me as Cookie, thank God for Netflix because people are so moved by my performance they’re like, ‘Where has she been?’ I’ve always said I want to do the type of work that people study," she tells the magazine. 
The issue hits newsstands on Friday, October 16.
